author: doc
msg: Fix up a few things for the ant create to work on mac

author: doc
msg: Add new windows create script for android as a cscript script. Also created an ant xml that should work on mac too.

author: doc
msg: Remove xlargescreen since it is only supported if you are building with the latest SDK. Yes people *should* be building with that but it's not even on any phones yet

author: doc
msg: Moved default plugins.xml, www, and manifest.xml into a folder structure that can be straight copied over a new android project. change the bash script to update the target of the phonegap framework dir before building
